welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rialto, where small-town charm meets big-city energy! Known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and vibrant community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rialto has to offer.

restaurants.name: Baker's Drive-Thru
restaurants.description: Baker's Drive-Thru is a fast food restaurant located in Rialto.
restaurants.address: 500 E Foothill Blvd (at N Acacia Ave), Rialto, CA 92376
